The Miller PipePro 450 RFC is a versatile multiprocess welding power source. It supports various welding processes, including MIG (GMAW), pulsed MIG (GMAW-P), flux-cored (FCAW), TIG (GTAW), stick (SMAW), and air carbon arc (CAC-A) cutting and gouging.
